Author: Michael Stapelberg
Comment:
When using i3_autostart => 0 and launch_with_config(), you need a corresponding exit_gracefully($pid) at the end of the file.

Do you actually need a custom i3 config? It seems to me like this test could be simplified :).

Author: Michael Stapelberg
Comment: The result of missing exit_gracefully() is that the test suite does not run without problems for me, so please fix this.

Author: jj
Comment: Will try to simplify this! I sadly just forgot about the exit_gracefully.
